text: Hello!  I hope you are doing well.  This is an interesting task - I'm glad to see that part of the payment for this task is donated to such a good cause.  What do you think?
I'm doing fine. I agree about the donation option.

I don't know much about the specific charity, but I'm a mom, and I think it's really important to help kids around the world.  From what I've heard, Save the Children is a great organization that really makes a different.  I've read they've been doing a lot of work in Syria.
What charity are you talking about?

The info that I'm seeing on my end is that we can choose to donate part of what we earn in this task to Save the Children.  It's a large philanthropic organization that works on ensuring children's rights to health, education, and safety.  They have apparently done work recently to help children in Syria impacted by the civil war.
Do you know how long they've been around?
I don't see any exact date.  However, they have done work to improve access to education, medicine, and food in Darfur and appear to have been working when that area was also impacted by civil war.
Thanks, what are your contribution plans?
I am debating between 50% and all of the bonus.  So between 1 and 2 dollars.  I think even $1 can make a difference in their efforts.  What about you?
I'm thinking about the same

I think that seems fair.  From the description, they seem to have a pretty low overhead so even $1 will go directly toward the charitable efforts.  They've also apparently been involved in Jimmy Carter's organization that seeks to give kids and families clean water by getting rid of the guinea worm.  The water filters they use only cost $.90
Thanks for those details, I'd give a dollar to help.
Sounds like a good plan. So that $1 will be deducted from the payment.  My instructions say the research team will send all the donations directly.
OK, they're making it easy to help
Yes - I think that's nice.  They are making it an easy task for us!
yes, everyone wins
Seems like we are in agreement.  It was nice working with you.
same here, have a nice rest of your Sunday
You too.  It's nice to have a long weekend - enjoy it!
ok, goodbye for now
